item.title: Presentations in Conferences and Seminars

Zago in the “Steering Committee”) for the organisation of the workshop “Fostering a European Network on Financial Efficiency: Banking, Portfolio Theory and Computational Issues” (25 February 2008 at IFRESI, Lille).
